channel.title: Can't find manifest
channel.description:
I jar'd my client and I had it do main-class: client It opens and runs fine on my cpu. Well when I try it on my other cpu it won't open, it can't find that client file.
How do I make it so that when people run the jar it opens?

item.title: Can't find manifest
item.dc:creator: @Zura_Andy Zura_Andy
item.description:
@Zura_Andy wrote:

it was because it was a newer java then on my new cpu. fixed it…

CLOSE THIS

Read full topic

item.title: Can't find manifest
item.dc:creator: @jaspernuts jaspernuts
item.description:
@jaspernuts wrote:

[quote=“Zura_Andy, post:1, topic:540805”]I jar’d my client and I had it do main-class: client
It opens and runs fine on my cpu.
Well when I try it on my other cpu it won’t open, it can’t find that client file.

How do I make it so that when people run the jar it opens?[/quote]
have the manifest in jarmaker

mainclass: client
sealed: true
and have the correct files for the client, make sure the cache isn’t in the folder so it doesn’t jar it

Read full topic
